name: No Coke For You ! ( My​ First Game Jam: Summer 2021)
name_original: No Coke For You ! ( My​ First Game Jam: Summer 2021)
description:
This Game is a ''Prototype'' and Might Stay as a ''Prototype'' for the rest of its life

No Coke For You ! - Top Down Shooter Where You Need To Protect Your Stack Of Coke From A Zombie Apocalypse.

This Game Is A Submission To :  My First Game Jam: Summer 2021

Story : Bryan is a survivor of a Zombie Apocalypse ... I mean, he is CRAZY... HE thinks that he is a SURVIVOR, but in fact he is just dreaming in a comfortable bed.                       

He dreams of Coke ?! Kinda WEIRD !

Controls :

W - A - S - D : Move Bryan.

LMB : Shoot any gun .

Q : Push / Kill. 

F : Stop The Time. ( cost 20 "$$" )

P : Save The Game.

E : Reload your current weapon ( cost 10 "$$" )

1 ... 3 : Guns ( In Dev ).

Mechanics :  Time Stopping Ability :

Stop everything around you for a limited time (( actually ) unlimited time ), you can stop Traps, Zombies and your own bullets.

Shooting Ability :

Shoot through everything on your way and kill everything on your way.

Push / Kill Ability :

Push and Kill everything on your way. WARNING : You CAN'T get money from this ability 

Other ... :

Symbols:

$$ : in game money

Bug I need to FIX :

1- Shadow aren't perfectly attached to the player.

2- The Zombies have no animations.

3- Zombies's grunt are a bit annoying .

4- The UI glitches when a number higher than 100 is on screen
